headline: Kroger Georgia Clinic Closures Recast Health Strategy And Capital Use
summary: Kroger is closing all Georgia locations of The Little Clinic health centers inside its grocery stores. The move affects the retailer's in-store healthcare footprint in the state and shifts how it offers health and wellness services locally. Kroger, listed as NYSE:KR, is making this change while its shares trade at $66.8. The stock has delivered a 61.3% return over 3 years and 121.1% over 5 years, with gains of 8.1% over both the past week and past month. Those figures indicate that...
